text: In early 2023, we visited Costa Rica on the recommendation of a close friend. We fell in love with it the moment we landed. The mountains, coastline, lush rainforest, wildlife, food, people, and culture are all beautiful. We knew we wanted to make this our second home.
We bought this beautiful condo unit built in 2024 as our second, eventually retirement home, and we thought we would share it with other people to enjoy as much as we do.

The unit was thoughtfully furnished by Hohm, a local custom-quality furniture and design company. The goal was to create a tranquil, warm, and homey space for guests to enjoy during their Costa Rica getaway.

If there is anything we can do to improve your stay, please donâ€™t hesitate to ask. If we make your stay memorable, we hope you will leave us a positive 5-star review. Vista Monte Mar is a new Airbnb, and achieving high-rated reviews would mean the world to us and will help motivate us to provide enjoyable accommodation for more guests to come. We thank you in advance for supporting us! We hope that you enjoy your stay!
